Flow.description: Adjustment to LMS Core's enhancement for refinancing tenor > 50 months Repromote from STG Adjustment LTV > 50% Repromote Expected the latest

formulas.name: FuncCalculateAge
formulas.expression: IF( OR( ISBLANK({!BirthDate}), LEN({!BirthDate}) <> 10, NOT(ISNUMBER(LEFT({!BirthDate},4))), NOT(ISNUMBER(MID({!BirthDate},6,2))), NOT(ISNUMBER(RIGHT({!BirthDate},2))) ), 0, YEAR(TODAY()) - VALUE(LEFT({!BirthDate},4)) - IF( OR( MONTH(TODAY()) < VALUE(MID({!BirthDate},6,2)), AND( MONTH(TODAY()) = VALUE(MID({!BirthDate},6,2)), DAY(TODAY()) < VALUE(RIGHT({!BirthDate},2)) ) ), 1, 0 ) )

formulas.name: FuncConvertGraceType
formulas.expression: IF( UPPER(TRIM({!GracePeriodType})) = "INTEREST ONLY", "INTEREST_ONLY", IF( UPPER(TRIM({!GracePeriodType})) = "ROLLOVER", "ROLL_OVER", UPPER(TRIM({!GracePeriodType})) ) )

Flow.label: Loan Calculator V5 Call
